entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 08:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain late this afternoon. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 this morning then west 20 late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 23 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
